name: Sopin v. Lukacher et al., Appellants

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and Bok, JJ.
parties: Sopin v. Lukacher et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The members of the Court, who heard this appeal, being evenly divided as to its merits, the decree of the court below is affirmed at the appellants’ costs.
opinions.author: Opinion

attorneys: A. Harry Levitan, with him Gammer é Shapiro, for appellants.
Alvin Diamond, with him Benjamin Paul, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Sopin v. Lukacher et al., Appellants.
Argued November 10, 1958.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and Bok, JJ.
reargument refused'March 13, 1959.
January 5, 1959:
A. Harry Levitan, with him Gammer é Shapiro, for appellants.
Alvin Diamond, with him Benjamin Paul, for appellees.
